00021 template <typename Matrix>
00022 class EigenPyConverter : public detail::PyConverterBase<Matrix> {
00023     typedef typename Matrix::Scalar Scalar;
00024     typedef boost::mpl::int_<Matrix::RowsAtCompileTime> Rows;
00025     typedef boost::mpl::int_<Matrix::ColsAtCompileTime> Cols;
00026     typedef boost::mpl::int_<Matrix::SizeAtCompileTime> Size;
00027     typedef Eigen::Matrix<Scalar,Rows::value,Cols::value> TrueMatrix;
00028 
00029     static PyPtr getNumpyMatrixType() {
00030         PyPtr numpyModule(PyImport_ImportModule("numpy"),false);
00031         if (numpyModule) {
00032             return PyPtr(PyObject_GetAttrString(numpyModule.get(),"matrix"),false);
00033         }
00034         return PyPtr();
00035     }
00036 
00037     static PyPtr makeNumpyMatrix(PyPtr const & array) {
00038         PyPtr matrixType(getNumpyMatrixType());
00039         if (!matrixType) return PyPtr();
00040         PyPtr args(PyTuple_Pack(1,array.get()),false);
00041         PyPtr kwds(PyDict_New(),false);
00042         if (PyDict_SetItemString(kwds.get(),"copy",Py_False) != 0) return PyPtr();
00043         return PyPtr(PyObject_Call(matrixType.get(),args.get(),kwds.get()),false);
00044     }
00045 
00046 public:
00047 
00054     static PyObject * toPython(
00055         Matrix const & input, 
00056         PyObject * owner = NULL,
00057         bool writeable = true,
00058         bool squeeze = false
00059     ) {
00060         Array<Scalar,2> array(ndarray::viewMatrixAsArray(const_cast<Matrix&>(input)));
00061         PyPtr pyArray;
00062         if (writeable) {
00063             pyArray = PyPtr(PyConverter< Array<Scalar,2> >::toPython(array,owner),false);
00064         } else {
00065             pyArray = PyPtr(PyConverter< Array<Scalar const,2> >::toPython(array,owner),false);
00066         }
00067         PyPtr r;
00068         if (squeeze) {
00069             r.reset(PyArray_Squeeze(reinterpret_cast<PyArrayObject*>(pyArray.get())));
00070         } else {
00071             r = makeNumpyMatrix(pyArray);
00072         }
00073         if (!r) return NULL;
00074         Py_XINCREF(r.get());
00075         return r.get();
00076 
00077     }
00078 
00083     static PyTypeObject const * getPyType() {
00084         return reinterpret_cast<PyTypeObject*>(getNumpyMatrixType().get());
00085     }
00086 
00095     static bool fromPythonStage1(
00096         PyPtr & p 
00100     ) {
00101         PyPtr tmp = makeNumpyMatrix(p);
00102         if (!tmp) return false;
00103         if (Cols::value != Eigen::Dynamic && Cols::value != PyArray_DIM(tmp.get(),1)) {
00104             if (Cols::value == 1 && PyArray_DIM(tmp.get(),0) == 1) { 
00105                 tmp = PyPtr(PyObject_CallMethod(tmp.get(),const_cast<char*>("transpose"),NULL),false);
00106             } else {
00107                 PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,"Incorrect number of columns for matrix.");
00108                 return false;
00109             }
00110         }
00111         if (Rows::value != Eigen::Dynamic && Rows::value != PyArray_DIM(tmp.get(),0)) {
00112             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,"Incorrect number of rows for matrix.");
00113             return false;
00114         }
00115         
00116         p = tmp;
00117         return true;
00118     }
00119 
00127     static bool fromPythonStage2(
00128         PyPtr const & p, 
00129         Matrix & output       
00130     ) {
00131         NDARRAY_ASSERT(p);
00132         PyPtr matrixType(getNumpyMatrixType());
00133         if (!matrixType) return false;
00134         NDARRAY_ASSERT(PyObject_IsInstance(p.get(),matrixType.get()));
00135         Array<Scalar,2,2> array;
00136         if (!PyConverter< Array<Scalar,2,2> >::fromPythonStage2(p,array)) return false;
00137         int rows = array.template getSize<0>();
00138         int cols = array.template getSize<1>();
00139         Eigen::Block<ndarray::EigenView<Scalar,2,2>,Rows::value,Cols::value> block(
00140             ndarray::viewAsEigen(array), 0, 0, rows, cols
00141         );
00142         output = block;
00143         return true;
00144     }
00145 
00146 };
